November 10-12 2023, Geonetric Cedar Rapids and online

Doors open 6pm Friday November 10 (Full Schedule)

Calling all artists, developers, designers and gamers!

Join us in making a game in a weekend and have fun while doing it. No entry fee. Bring a friend!

For more information about the organizers, Iowa City Game Developers Meetup, visit https://iowacitygamedev.org/
